action.action-desc: Mr. Emmer introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To amend section 242 of the National Housing Act to provide parity with respect to access to the mortgage insurance for hospitals program for licensed hospitals, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Securing Facilities for Mental Health Services Act.

subsection.text: Section 242(b)(1) of the National Housing Act (12 U.S.C. 1715z–7(b)(1)) is amended—

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (A), by striking the semicolon at the end and inserting ; and;

subsection.text: The amendments made by this section shall apply upon the date of the enactment of this Act.
